reviews.title: Charlene white
reviews.details: Lori has been extremely helpful with explaining the process of refinancing. She thorough with  explaining the different options and all refinancing terms for my clear understanding of what she was looking at and how it benefited or hinder the outcome. She was patient and guided me through everything.. She listen for a clear understanding of what my long term goal was and she delivered.. I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.
reviews.author: Charlene

reviews.title: It was a good experience.
reviews.details: After hitting brick walls with other companies, Stephen Sasso was very helpful in getting me through the process with success. He is empathetic.  He talked me through the electronic filing in and signing which was pivotal for me, not having a computer background.
reviews.author: Jean

reviews.title: Great Experience
reviews.details: Ruth is exceptional and stays in contact with you at all times. Refinancing was easy and fast. She is great to work with for your loan needs.
reviews.author: Nikita

reviews.title: It was a great experience.
reviews.details: Marissa, the agent I worked with, listened to my needs and responded with an excellent offer.  She  sent information clearly and immediately provided a check list of documents I would need so that I could prepare and move the process along more quickly.
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: Best person to work with!
reviews.details: AJ was very helpful during the entire process. He did everything he said he would and was always fast to answer any questions i had. I feel like i made a friend. I highly recommend him!
reviews.author: Richard

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.details: Brandon made what seemed impossible, happen. I've had credit issues in the past that made getting approved seem impossible. He helped us along the way.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: Professional and accommodating
reviews.details: Mr Ismail made obtaining a refinance on our home easy and convenient.  He tailored meetings to our schedule and always had the answers to any questions we had.  Mr Ismailâ€™s availability was impressive, he worked very hard to get us the best rate and loan.  Mr Ismail was always professional.  I would absolutely recommend him to my friends and family.
reviews.author: Jacqueline

reviews.title: Exceptional experience
reviews.details: My experience with Reliance First Capital was, from beginning to end, a challenge.  I am thankful for the  mortgage analyst for guiding me through it with patience, humor and a great deal of understanding when it at times became frustating.  The frustrations were all due to rules and regulations that exist to protect the me, the consumer as well as the lenders, however at the time it didn't always seem like it!  Ms. Oula "Suzanne" Horn, however, navigated the process successfully and left me feeling confident that I received the best deal for my circumstances and that all the i's were dotted and t's were crossed.  She answered questions and provided information that I needed to be confident and comfortable duriing the whole process.  I would recommend Reliance First Capital to family and friends and Ms. Horn as a professional who is a very thorough and thoughtful mortgage analyst.
reviews.author: Yuvetta

reviews.title: Excellent Experience
reviews.details: Bridget was wonderful from start to finish.  I am a questions girl and she had answers to all of them!Thank you for a great loan experience.
reviews.author: Deborah

reviews.title: AWSOME!!!
reviews.details: I read some of the other reviews and I wish I can say more or different but everything is true. Bridget is my new best friend. My refi was complicated  and l lost hope for mortage lenders. When Bridget called and we spoke I was like here we go they tell you good news up front then call a different department and everything changes and keeps changing for the wrost. If there was was fairy godmother Bridget is it and my prayers were answered.  With a ton of changes, back and forth emails, phone calls, numbers fling all over the place do to me changing things and aking a million questions ok more like a zillion questions, Bridget was extremely helpful, return my calls and emails fast, plolit and professional. She followed up on everything (I want to express everything) explained everything to me NO SUPRISES.  I loved seeing her number show up on my caller ID it made me smile.  I was like oh yeah we are getting closer to the finish line and every phone call I got good news. I've never had such a smooth closeing within 2 months from our first call even with hurrince that hit and my appriral had to be rescheduled still closed in 2 months.  I highly recommend to everyone.
reviews.author: Karen
